name: midweek
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the middle of the week, usually from Tuesday to Thursday: By midweek, the situation had become worrying.

happening in or relating to the middle of the week, usually from Tuesday to Thursday: After our midweek defeat we know we did not play especially well yesterday. Weekend and midweek breaks are available as well as a summer special during August.
More examplesFewer examplesWe have five midweek matches coming up. Low-season midweek fares from both cities start at around $460.The song is number one in the midweek charts.

in the middle of the week, usually from Tuesday to Thursday: The magazine comes out midweek. It is important to book as far in advance as you can and go midweek if possible.
More examplesFewer examplesHe will struggle to play midweek as well as weekends.You can pick up a very low fare this autumn - especially if you can fly midweek. Tickets cost from £106 to £562, depending on whether you travel midweek or at the weekend.
